articles.description: AS Roma have announced the signing of Manchester United midfielder Nemanja Matic on a free transfer. The 33-year-old Serbia international is reunited with Jose Mourinho for a third time.
articles.content:
Roma have announced the signing of midfielder Nemanja Matic after his departure from Manchester United.
The Serbia international, who revealed in April that he would be leaving Old Trafford at the e… [+2898 chars]
